channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Still not fixed how many times do we need to report thi, 9th April
item.description:
Right next to a double roundabout very dangerous for cars and cyclists. Sort ASAP please!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Cheltenham Road, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 9th April
item.description:
Customer is concerned about the trees in the area of the Methodist church, they have been worked on yesterday and the caller has noticed one of them looks dead near the top where the work was carried out. They also have concerns with the 2 large trees outside 45/46 as they have a large amount of mistletoe in them and the customer feels this is going to harm the tree.
Report on FixMyStreet
